Scripts¶

NYT Crawl¶

Created on April 9, 2020

@author: Kamron Afshar

scripts.NYTimes_Scrape.extract_text(full_article_list)¶

using beautiful soup to extract the text from these articles

scripts.NYTimes_Scrape.generate_urls(api)¶

Generate URLS for articles with titles Split into two steps to circumvent crawling obstacles

scripts.NYTimes_Scrape.main()¶

This script crawls the New York Times for text articles related to politics

Fake News Pull¶

Created on April 9, 2020

@author: Sunny Kwong

scripts.fake_news_pull.extract_empire(max_page)¶

Extract articles from EmpireNews.net in the political section

scripts.fake_news_pull.extract_onion(max_page)¶

Extract articles from the onion

scripts.fake_news_pull.extract_real_true_news(max_page)¶

Extract articles from realtruenews.org, a fake news website for politics

scripts.fake_news_pull.get_text_title_link(url)¶

Takes an article URL, and returns the article URL, Title, and text

scripts.fake_news_pull.main()¶

This script generates our ‘fake’ articles for training
